column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My first Chicago pizza experience was terrible! We arrive and order a pizza so it cooks while we wait for a table. 1 hour later
column3: which takes 5 more minutes just to be greeted. Our server was not attentive the entire time. After waiting about another 20min at the table
column4: the pizza comes out. I'm not joking
column5: the pizza was cold to the point that the cheese was solid in the center. I other tables' food looked great but ours was sad. We just paid and left because we couldn't sit around another hour for a new pizza because we had a show to catch. Very disappointing service and food!!!
